description: This file defines the NoteEditorActivity class, an Android activity responsible for creating and editing notes within the app. It manages UI components for note title, content, folder selection, pinning, and favoriting, and interacts with the NotesRepository for data persistence. The class handles loading existing notes for editing, saving new or updated notes, and deleting notes.

classes.name: NoteEditorActivity
classes.description: An Android activity for creating or editing notes, managing UI components and interactions with the notes repository.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI components, loads folders, and if applicable, loads an existing note for editing.

methods.name: loadFolders
methods.description: Fetches the list of folders from the repository and populates the folder selection spinner.

methods.name: bindNote
methods.description: Binds the data from a Note object to the UI components for editing.

methods.name: onCreateOptionsMenu
methods.description: Inflates the menu options, showing delete only when editing an existing note.

methods.name: onOptionsItemSelected
methods.description: Handles menu item selections for saving, deleting, or navigating back.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Collects data from UI and saves or updates the note in the repository.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes the current note from the repository.
